data.text: If I could rate 10 stars I would. I can't say enough good things about Cash App! I use it for all my banking needs. I get paid 3 days early, I save money with roundups, my ATM fees are reimbursed and now I have $50 free overdraft protection! Love this app more than PayPal or Venmo. So easy to send and receive $. No waiting for verification or anything. And almost everyone is on cash app. Super easy to look people up whether or not they are on your contact list

To view your card info you have to open up chrome and go to autofill. If you want to adjust payment settings you need to go the Google app instead. But if you want to tap-to-pay you use google wallet, but if you want to view your transactions you have to use this pointless app. Google took the concept of uncomplicated, convenient, and all in one place, and said "let's do the polar opposite!" Half of google searches are just people troubleshooting stupid issues that Google itself created

I've been using it for a while. Really convenient not needing to dig for my wallet everytime. My only wish is that there was some way to get digital receipts when you pay, and they appear in the wallet/pay app. Pretty sure the checkout retail needs to update in order to achieve this, but you'd think saving paper receipts would be good motivation. Still... It's a great app.

Overall, this is a really good app. Especially since the last update that requires users to unlock to use Google Pay. I wish they made access to the wallet a little easier. Currently, pay and insights are on a menu at the bottom but to access wallet you have to go to the menu at the top right, then open wallet. Wallet really needs to be at the bottom where Pay and Insights are located.

Definitely a nice feature if you forget your wallet,purse,debit card,etc., and absolutely have to have gas or something important! Only thing I really wish you could add as a feature would be that it would show you the balance/amount able to spend on each of the attached card accounts. Just a thought, idk if that's something you could even implement into the app, but I'm sure I'm not the only person who would benefit from a feature like that.

Right now I am having a hard time getting the app to work. Some store it works great, in others it declines. Almost as if it's not connecting to the wifi. But the last week I can't get it to connect at all. Even though my phone is connected and nothing else has changed. PLEASE FIX THE BUGS I am referring to the Google pay app.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that, Sharity. Can you check these few steps and let us know if it helps? g.co/help/rckj4u. If everything looks good but you still experience problems, visit: : http://goo.gle/2FoMIs9. Thanks for reaching out.

data.text: Google Pay has revolutionized the way the people manage their finances! From seamless transactions to earning rewards, this app has it all. The user-friendly interface makes sending and receiving money a breeze, and the security features provide peace of mind. Plus, the ability to pay bills and split expenses with friends simplifies my life. I highly recommend GPay to anyone looking for a convenient and reliable payment solution.

This is perfect! When compared to other banking apps, this one receives a lot of attention because of its coin rewards system, which allows users to temporarily access the pro version. The lack of useful shortcut keys or gestures, such the ability to swipe to remove songs from the list or tap a song to add it without clearing the entire queue, is the reason it only gets four stars. In spite of this, the app offers an amazing musical experience that is reminiscent of a personal music library.

Very impressive! Although there is a problem with the application, the transaction are excellent. My phone keeps making notification noises even after I disable them. It's annoying that I get too many alerts in one day. I ask that someone on the development team take care of this issue. Positively, I like the app's user interface, ease of use, and top-notch customer support. Queries are answered quickly, and the crew provides solutions right away. The app is well-structured, easy to use.

I changed my rating from 5 to 1 only because there is no way way to find all my split expense groups in one single place. And moreover the more button only shows me the data for current and previous month only. It doesn't show any contact or split group that was done before prev month. This was working once. Not sure when it was removed and why it was removed. Bring the feature back or provide the option to see all split groups at one place then I'll change the rating.

This app is are great, although there hasn't been a single font update over the years, but for older phone versions, clean and just so smooth it does the job quite well. but having to watch two 30 seconds ads every single time you want to use it for free for a single day, is just pure dumb. we should get at le ast 2-3 fronts for free and have an option to watch ads if we need more, it makes it so much easier that way. also, some ads are unquitable, i cannot quit many of those ads never.

The app was working fine, I don't know what happened. I did a transaction a few hours ago and now I can't log in to the app. It shows wrong pin. It's impossible that I'm entering a wrong pin. I'm unable to reset it. After I put in my Google account password, it just goes back to gpay app and the process does not move further. Fix it please.
data.replyText: Sorry about that, Salim. If you forgot your UPI PIN, you can create a new one. Check out the instruction video here: https://goo.gle/2PYxHlx. Note that you'll need your debit card details to proceed. Hope this helps!

data.text: I loved this app....!!!! In my experience of using the app for all kinds of payments and others, the performance is outstanding and smooth. The app layout and interface is very impressive. The cash back points for various payments is an added bonus. Kudos to the App team. However a small point to note for improvement. When the phone is on mobile data and not on wifi, a pop up appears frequently at the bottom saying " No internet available". So everytime it has to be clicked and removed....!

Unique features are very interesting. The Fastest And Greatest App...But for the past month, it hasn't been functioning properly. I am able to use any barcode to scan and process payments. But my keyboard does not appear when I want to transfer money to someone via mobile. Not at all. Help, please; I've tried everything. I deleted the app's data and cache and even uninstalled and reloaded it. But, all in vain. Even after searching Google and YouTube, I still can't seem to grasp the issue.

Better than other apps. I can't use the app with the current changes. Previous Review Very good banking software that does it everything. I adore this application. If the PPF account can also be examined, it would be fantastic. The user interface is quite intuitive, and the application is light and quick. I've watched this software develop from a basic version with limited features to the robust version it is today. far superior to its rival banking apps.

It is always good! This app is fantastic and ideal for anyone trying to take quality photos. It produces crisp images and does a fantastic job capturing them. I'm giving it five stars since it merits praise for enabling this. There are no advertisements that might cause a disruption either. For those who are interested in themes, this program also contains lovely features. It is simple to use and has the potential to improve any app. People will find it to be of great use.

One of the most unreliable apps on the store. Has given me so much pain. Online transactions fail all the time. Money gets debited but transaction fails at the vendor end then I have to spend time running behind the bank (Google Pay doesn't take up any responsibility) and the vendor. Can't rely on it to pay for quick transactions like cab/auto fares because it fails at the most critical points and you are left scrambling. Planning to move completely to other UPI apps.

It has been over three years since the Flutter-based version was released, yet the app still feels very sluggish and jittery even on a flagship phone, especially during scrolling. However, I really like the fact it stores transaction history indefinitely, and doesn't hide the VPA of online merchants in transaction history, which PhonePe is notorious for. It would have been great if you could add an option to copy transaction details to clipboard.

No issues with transactions. But a severe issue with transactions details page. For if i search in transactions details page as "above 1000" , it is supposed to show me transactions above 1000, which is shown correctly,, but the issue lies with consolidated transaction about in "month" section. The amount shown is far higher than actually expense above 1000 done for that month. This is a misinformation, needing immediate correction.

I have been a user of Google Pay for a considerable period, but recently, my experience has been less than satisfactory. For the past month, Google Pay has been consistently showing a 'Something went wrong' error during bank transactions. This issue is specific to Google Pay, as other payment apps work fine. Disappointing, considering its previous reliability.

Most rewards & offers are useless. Make separate notification delivery for ads, promotions & actual transactions so that we can block the ads & promotions. This is cheap & old trick to put all types of notifications under same header so that we cant block individually, same as amazon app is doing. 3rd party apps are implementing it, dont tell me google staff arent competent enough.

Application gets hanged while clicking on history. Last payment shows deducted but it is not credited to the merchant and same thing happened few months back. Amount got credited to the merchant after a week, but the merchant denied. Google pay team says to contact bank and bank needs Merchants transaction history which he isn't ready to share. Now nobody is helping.
data.replyText: Hi Mohammed. Please give these steps a try: Uninstall the Google Pay app, restart your device and then reinstall the app. Try adding the bank account again using the steps given in this guide: https://goo.gl/VAyBLo. If you still face issues, get in touch with our specialists: Open the app - Tap on your picture - Help & feedback - Contact us.

data.text: I was the happiest user of gpay .. since beginning . But after recent update... I found that gpay is no more unique ... Started charging platform fee.. though it's almost negligible.. but why to charge them? Like if it's a phonepe or Paytm fine understandable... Now even gpay started charging .. which is ridiculous Hope that u guys change this if possible . Other than that you are always best for me
data.replyText: Hi Siddha. Like many payments platforms, Google Pay also levies a nominal convenience fee for recharges made from its platform. The fee applicable to an order is displayed on the payment page (before you go ahead with the payment) on the Google Pay app.

data.text: Still agreeing that the app is fake with another recharge and money debit issue Very bad and Disloyal app..if themoney left your account or there is a stuck payment after waiting for hours for the customer care to pick up the call the say we have raised a issue but the money will never be returned to your account

Everything is fine. But, recently I got an issue like my transaction is failed due to network issue. And in the transaction history the status is failed. But my money got debited from the bank account and I didn't got any message like money got debited,but when I check my balance the money got debited. Then, I raised a ticket. They said the money will be credited within 3days. Now, they are asking for the bank statement after 3 days. I really don't like this feature. Please fix this.

We have a new problem.. Most of the times UPI transaction doesn't get completed. The status just keeps rotating. What is one supposed to do? It doesn't even say money deducted or transaction failed. Update turned it useless. It was working till I updated. All my accounts are inactive and I am unable to activate them.
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.

data.text: they haven't still updated my account transaction history I've reached out to them but they keep on telling about two accounts which I don't have I have only one account and the transaction history has always been working good but it's been one month since the last transaction history is shown and it's the same since then I can't even see whether people have paid me Or credited the money to me

I have installed this app for the first time but it's not letting me enter my mobile number due to some technical issue or a bug. The keypad doesn't open to type the number. I have uninstalled and installed the app back atleast 7/8 times and even updated my android system but same issue persists.

Uninstalling app for bad performance in bill payments. Large amount is stuck for last 3 days and helpline is doing nothing, just adding more time. Failed transaction screen says 3 business days for refund, helpline is saying 48 hrs + 3 business day. I suggest others not do bill payments of higher value, if you have limited money to transfer. Thanks

The apps and transactions are generally working fine. But the vouchers including cashback vouchers are useless. You read all instructions and redeem it. And then no scratch card gets credited. The support creates a case. It gets stuck for days with no way to check progress. And the voucher expires.
data.replyText: Hi Anay. We suggest you to contact our specialist team for assistance on this. Here's how: Call our support: 1-800-419-0157 between 8 AM to Midnight or open the Google Pay app - Tap on your picture - Help & feedback - Get help. More details: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Thank you.

data.text: Recently I have been experiencing a problem...after transaction, the app does not show the receipt screen, rather the screen appears blank. On top of that, even I press back button, it does not respond. Pressing home button and again opening the app does nothing. Plz fix this.
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience, Sunil. Please ensure that you're using the latest version of the app. For more info, check out our Help Center: https://goo.gle/3aQkQu3. For further assistance, reach out to our support team. Here's how: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc.

data.text: Dear Google pay, now a days you are charging platform fees for recharges and some bill payments. This is really not good. I do my recharges and bill payments through Google pay and for the platform charge each time, I have to pay a good amount of extra charge for all these payments. This is really unacceptable for me. Please stop to charge platform fee otherwise I shall be bound to shift to the other payment app / platform.

This app is good for payments. But the reward system is the worst. Always gives" better luck next time". I have been getting continuously this reward since my payment level reached 250. Now I have reached 433, still getting " better luck next time". Very disappointed with this reward system. Most of the rewards will be useless.

Online payments are much needed nowadays and GPay really plays an important role here...App UI is good and easy to use and to make payments. But one thing is missing. *An option should be added to cancel any pending or processing payment to avoid any repeated payment.*

A really well designed and sought out app. Only slight issue i think for me is that I'm not comfortable sharing my phone number whilst sending or receiving money. Please do something to keep the phone number a secret. Searching someone you need to pay or receive money from should be soley done with UPI IDs. Phone numbers are sensitive informations which many of us aren't comfortable sharing it. Please Google take a look at this.

I am using it since 2019 but I am not able to add my credit card into my account after I updated it. I tried to connect with customer care but they just cut the call whenever I reach customer executive. didn't expected this from Google. I would like them to solve this issue.

Google says, we're going to force you to Wallet, take away Google Pay and any functionality: no payments to each other. No shopping deals. Don't try to tell me this is for my own good. Your shopping search option through your Google site is laughable. What do we get like 25 options? They're all the same price. 25 options off the entire internet? Seriously?

Awesome game .. I've been playing this game since 2018 and never got disappointed....... It's just that if we could customize aur characters. And ya if we purchase a particular character and the players who haven't downloaded that costume they won't be able to see aur new character that's an issue 😅 otherwise the game, graphic, control, theme, everything is awesome

Since our last review, Google has combined its in-store, online, and person-to-person payment apps into a single offering called Google Pay. This one app handles all your transactions, instead of forcing you to use Google Pay Send for paying people and Android Pay for NFC. The app works on iOS as well as Android and the web, so it has broader appeal than both Apple Pay and Samsung Pay. Google Pay offers both NFC payment at tons of venues and smart watch support.

...why dont you design a wedget for scanning and paying directly from the homescreen, it'd save much time, and be more quick. just a tip. One more thing, that, I have now been using this app for soo long now, yet I have only rs 77 as the reward.. 🤷 never once won a better reward ! and ydhshdhdjdjdjsj!

It is a good app, i am using it since 3 years. But, now a days i am not able to see transaction history, it just keeps on loading and transaction history never opens.I am facing this issue since 4 months. So, please look in to this and fix the issue.

Can't login to my account. Not recieving OTP. It has no option to fix my problem. I didnt get otp after giving my phone number. And it says my "Device is rooted or running in a custom OS" which is not. My device is Samsung Galaxy M31s. I never rooted my device. I used Google Pay Early. I dont know what just happened. EDIT: i have fixed Google pay is now. A Youtube video saved me.
data.replyText: Hi Muhammed. Currently, Google Pay is compatible with Android 5.0 or higher devices only. Also, to ensure financial security, Google Pay app works only on secured devices and not on rooted ones or on custom ROMs. For further assistance you can reach out to our support team: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc.

data.text: I don't know why the app doesn't working,another person can't pay me,while the person pay me they had show my bank accounts isn't added,but I used this app 1 year,that's mean I could pay everyone without my bank account in last 1 year,that your app meant😡,fix the issue,it's a big trouble for me on a more transaction.😡😡
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience, Subhadeep. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.

data.text: As a Prominent Google pay user, initially thrilled with its rewards and simplicity. App UI remains excellent, but recent times see it swamped with irrelevant third-party ad offers, pushing valuable cashbacks and rewards into the shadows. Payment system, thankfully, stays fast and reliable. Needs a focus on user value over flashy extras to retain loyal fans.

Convenient and seamless - with the news that this will go away eventually and Wallet was coming back to take over, I hope they keep the ability to send and receive payment from friends and family. I really wish this app was staying for the long haul

I find it absolutely absurd that this app is somehow tied to the system screen-lock and not using an app unlock feature like any banking app or venmo. At a minimum you should at least be able to choose or have a setting that lets you toggle between one and the other. The problem is that when someone has an idea, it's not always a good idea and your peers need to speak up in a respectful way.

I am big time user of gpay app. I am happy about the app for what it offers. However the biggest gripe is that there is no quick way to get back to next payment scan after completing one. After completing a payment, I have to hit 'Done' then it takes to me to the page with transaction history for that merchant account. In order to start a new transaction I have to go back and then select the option, it is a hassle like this. Please provide quick way to get back to make a next payment.

Google pay has become really slow in last few months whether it's for UPI payments or payments through credit card. It takes good 10-15 seconds to settle the transaction which is bizzare compared other apps like cred. Slowly moving away from using google pay altogether.

If I could rate it any lower I would . I had someone send me 70 dollars on the app and the money arrived but when I went to go take the 70 dollars off the app the whole screen for the Google Pay app went completely blank I went to the Play store and to my app manager tried to open it from there and nothing still blank don't know what I should do

I recently experienced a sense of disappointment with Google Pay due to the introduction of a convenience fee. As a loyal user, I have always appreciated the convenience and efficiency the platform provided. However, the imposition of this additional fee has left me feeling unsatisfied and I'm not happy for this new update I had about extra fee😔😔😔😔😔

Frustrating Card Set Up Process on Galaxy S24! New phone,cards didn't switch over, annoying, but fine I get it. In the app I click my card and it says "finish set up". Cool. I click finish setup and it takes me to a screen with a singular button that says "call your bank" for a verification code. Fine. Called my bank, got the code, log back into the app, it still just has a single "call your bank" button. WHERE DO I PUT THE CODE? Chat and call support have been useless. Card still not set up. 🤦

Worst app!! I've been trying to cancel autopay to jiocinema repeatedly. Each time it's showing error something went wrong. When I contacted customer service, they told that they've informed their specialist team and they didn't do anything.

Certain pages while taking screenshots it's yours at this app doesn't support screenshot but if we open any profile or stay on homescreen at that time screenshot get captured so why is this like as per your preferred things??? Don't reply me as erite to your mail which you guys never take care... And if you need proof yhen allow to attach images here itself

I am facing this issue for a while now. There is a technical glitch on the app wherein this doesn't go to the UPI password screen and gets stuck at the beginning. My device is Motorola edge 30 pro. Looks like this is device specific. The work around which I follow is a restart of device. This is happening for almost 6 months now and shows up once in a while. Tried reaching the GPay support but call got disconnected. Can you guys fix it?

I know this app is very good. But please help me. My payment has been stucked from yesterday, it has been debited from my account yesterday but the amount have not transferred into receiver's account. Please solve this issue please. I need money.
This app gives scratch card on every payment. But most of them are "better luck next time". You should not waste my time by sending notifications like you have a scratch card. It just useless.

I will never use this kinda application i will recommend you to go with phonepay. I have done the payment for mobile recharge it's jio. And the payment is still processing and the amount is ₹666 but still the amount didn't reflect in my account and not yet recharged.! How many days should I wait.
data.replyText: Sorry about that, Asifa. We suggest you to raise a ticket, here's how: Transaction history > Select the transaction > Having Issues > Payment issue > Follow on-screen instructions. Our specialist team is working diligently and will resolve this within 3 business days. Hope this helps.

data.text: It's verification code after verification code after verification code after verification code after verification code after verification code but not actually getting anywhere I'm not even lying when I say that I've spent over 30 minutes playing the game of let's send verification codes to try and connect your account but not actually doing anything because we don't know how to make an app work properly

Unable to make the payment.....getting message as " Your payment is declined. Retry with a different payment method " from last 48 hour......kindly resolve the issue urgently......!!!!! Thanks for your reply, but even after updating of app & full internet speed, still getting same message " your payment decline......try different method ," kindly advise & resolve the glitch.....!!!
data.replyText: Uh-oh. We're sorry, Balram. Please check if you're on the latest version of the app and have a stable internet connection. Some more information that can help: https://goo.gle/2EwevX6. For further assistance, reach out to our support team. Here's how: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc.

data.text: Recently, whenever i try to pay to important transactions like, hospital, car payments, credit payments, it never pays immediately, even in 5g areas, rather it shows check your bank transactions, even if amount is deducted, it still shows payment processing, which is another time waste, recently they're also charging fees for recharges, but first fix this false errors please
data.replyText: Uh-oh. We're sorry. Please check if you're on the latest version of the app and have a stable internet connection. Some more information that can help: https://goo.gle/2EwevX6. For further assistance, reach out to our support team. Here's how: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc.

data.text: Application is good. i have 2 suggestion. 1) Allow favorite or bookmark feature, so user doesnt need to serach unknown, unsaved contacts. 2) Transaction history should have filter option. IMPORTANT FEATURE MISSING ON GAPY Payment favourite feature is not available? I do some recurring payment monthly, it's very difficult to find those numbers. It would be great if we can give favourite feature to see all your important contact or payment receiver at one place.

The app sucks. The customer service is awful. The account was locked for 2 weeks and no one sent an email about that. I was driving myself crazy here try to use it. When I contacted them after 2 weeks they told me that they put on hold until I verify it. Guess what they asked me to verify 3 cards that are not even mine, that I never used in the app. They sent me a link to send my ID and bank statements and when I sent them they sent me email saying that I sent the documents to the wrong place.

Very bad app. Once you remove your sim card from your phone the app will need a verification when you re-enter your sim. And this verification process is too much slow. I have a full week and so more but my verification is yet pending. Just after clicking the option "Verification by sms", your internet speed will gradually fall and never your verification will be done. I have just uninstalled thisapp.I advice everyone not to install it. Instead of it, you may use other UPI apps.

Google Pay provides a convenient way to handle transactions and manage payments. Its integration with various apps and websites simplifies online shopping. While the interface is generally user-friendly, occasional glitches and transaction delays have been experienced. The security features are commendable, yet there's room for improvement in resolving customer support issues promptly. Overall, Google Pay is a handy tool for digital payments, but a bit more attention to reliability and customer

Again: it always asks me to verify my number every week or so. And mostly when I'm already in for paying the merchant. It has led me to miss out at offers. Last last review: now every now and then I'm getting new sim detected message and the Retry get's stuck. My prev review: why everytime I update the app, I have to activate my bank account? It starts right from the scratch. When you are in a situation to pay urgently,it asks for activation. My prev review: Too many times it is failing payment
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience. Our team is already working on resolving this at the earliest. We suggest you try again after a few hours. Appreciate your understanding.

data.text: The app is very much user friendly . But recently I installed on my new Samsung A05 model and I found the sensitivity of app key board is very low . Due to this error happens while inputting pin number and transaction fails . Also key board size is so big that it is not fitting within mobile screen size . I reinstalled app 4 to 5 times but no improvement . Otherwise it functioning very good .

Not working since yesterday. I don't do online payments usually anyway. When I need to, I expect it to work smoothly. Bank has somehow requested to reset UPI pin it shows, but when I try to do so, it shows "Oops! Something went wrong. Try again. " How many times am I supposed to TrY AgAiN??? I don't have all day. Please fix the issue. I'm so sick of it. Edit: Thank you for fixing the issue immediately. Finally, I successfully made the payment after resetting UPI pin. Thanks again.
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience, Areeha. Please ensure that you're using the latest version of the app. For more info, check out our Help Center: https://goo.gle/3aQkQu3. For further assistance, reach out to our support team. Here's how: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc.

data.text: This is my go-to app for all online payments, and it works flawlessly most of the time. My only gripe is with the rewards offered, as most of them are third-party tie-ups, such as cosmetics and brands, that are unwanted and always ignored by Google Pay users. Please go back to offering simple cashbacks instead, like before.

I really wish there was a way to skip the authentication when the phone is unlocked. I always have to tap my phone twice. I'll tap, then it will decline and ask for my fingerprint even though my phone is unlocked so I have to do the process all over again. It's a really issue for some of the slower machines

Tried to use Gpay via Subway app. After updating acct info and entering "send", an error message said "no Internet connection". I have a connection. Apparently my phone deactivated that app for lack of use. Would be more helpful for the app to say the account needs to be reactivated instead of the misleading and wrong statement it posted.

Since Few months I have facing issue while doing mobile recharge. I use prepaid services from jio and when I try to recharge using Google Pay, it's showing plans are not updated and the same is going on for a long time. I have been using Gpay for all kinds of bill payments and recharge as it was easy to access everything at one place. But now that these kind of issues are frequent and if not resolved, I think I need to ditch Gpay, search for some other service for these transactions.
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience, Shubham. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.

data.text: Poor experience from the app side . I have transferred an amount on last Friday and it didn't received on the receiver side or the money didn't get back on my account it's been 6 days it happen and still yet not response... One day after the transaction the gpay shows that the transaction was failed. I have been facing many issue about this transaction.. Who ever seeing this please careful guys while you paying big amount

Till last month, i paid my bills. But now it's not updating the new bill. I keep getting "Something went wrong" error while trying to get the electricity & LPG Cylinder bills updated. I tried updating the app, clearing the cache memory, but still the same. This is very irritating!
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience. Please ensure that you're using the app with a stable internet connection. For more info, check out our Help Center: https://goo.gle/3aQkQu3. For further assistance you can reach out to our support team: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc.

data.text: Such a worst UPI payment app. Not recommended to anyone even in tough time too. Even in these days also, the transactions are getting processed for days together and Literally it's taking 3 working days to resolve it. The way technical team works to resolve the customer issues is too worst. Look at other UPI app customer support, if the money got debited and not credited to beneficiary then within an hours things are getting resolved.

if payments stucks at processing it takes so much time to update. Customers just want fast update it may be failed or success they just want confirmation so that if it fails they will try other payment methods. its pathetic & embarrassing to wait until its update. merchants won't wait they want second payment. if both success then our money gone if that merchant is stranger. please fix this issue. Swipe right to scan was a great feature i liked that very much. please bring that back

Dear Gpay, Kindly fix the issue regarding payment which is deducted from my bank account and not received by receivers bank account. This is very horrible and trust issue with this app now. How can I convinced the receiver that payment is already deducted and I'm unable to send it again the same payment. If supposed it is some problem in between then reverse back the payment immediately so we can send it again. How you stuck the payment in between and doing loss the customers who trust you.
data.replyText: Sorry about that, Omkar. We suggest you to raise a ticket, here's how: Transaction history > Select the transaction > Having Issues > Payment issue > Follow on-screen instructions. Our specialist team is working diligently and will resolve this within 3 business days. Hope this helps.

data.text: Reliability has improved a lot recently. UI can be made cleaner and minimal. Also most of us don't really need scratch cards or other unnecessary items from a payment app. Please provide options to disable them.

This app plugin has an issue. A humongous issue with addresses. There is no review or edit page when buying anything through chrome. Every single website in existence has a secondary page to review an address for an order. This app doesn't have this essential function and has costed me time, money, gas, and my well being.

I don't see payment stuck in any other UPI app's other than Google pay. When we make a payment for a service they won't wait for hours and days to get the status of payment. I'll try to avoid Google pay in Future. It need not be success status all the time. Atleast a failure status is much better than money getting debited from bank account and payment stuck in processing

I am a old user of this app and I was satisfy with it but from few weeks it is not working completely. Anyone who pays by my QR code or by my no. then it doesn't show the name of the person and transaction history in the app. This is really a big issue. And also money is not added in my balance. I hope you will understand and fix this issue.
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.

data.text: Overall, Google Pay has been a reliable and efficient app for my transactions. While occasional server issues arise, the app's seamless interface and swift payment processes outweigh these minor inconveniences. It's my go-to for hassle-free digital payments.

Google Pay is much more than a digital wallet; it’s an innovative payment platform that includes all kinds of useful features. That said, its main purpose is to make payments quicker, safer, and easier for both buyers and sellers. It’s completely free, highly secure, and available to anyone with a smartphone – all they have to do is use the Google Pay app. Google Pay comes preinstalled on most Android phones, and is available in the App Store for iOS devices.  After setting up the app, the use

Google files safe folder-I have extra storage space, rebooted, cleared the cache, stable internet connection etc.. but still the update doesn't seem to be getting installed onto safe folder(just 0-5kb/s). I have around 10gb of files in safe folder. Can i copy the folder to different device and access it again after reinstalling the app?

Used to be my one and only app for online payments. But for sometimes now its always shows server error whenever i tried to make a payment, it's absolutely disgusting. So i shifted to PhonePay. Few mins i tried one more to time to send money from gpay but it showed server busy then i tried the same on phonepay and it smoothly transfered the money. I hope Google will fix it ASAP, as they are already losing trust.

This is worst app. I have transferred amount to my father in a emergency situation but transaction is failed but deducted from my account.. i contacted to customer care but they were saying that there is standard time for refund. Couldn't solved my problem. Other plateforms are better than Google pay.

Pathetic customer support I am trying to do payments since morning and all my payment requests are declined without any valid reason. The pop up says that my transaction is limited as it is a new account it seems. Its not at all a new account. Been using the same account since years. After all, there is no proper way I can communicate these to officials. Meanwhile the same account linked to Gpay is functioning well with bank's app.

Good app. But cannot add BSNL Post paid number for bill payment and also Airtel black number. For BSNL, even after entering the mobile number as required, after submission, it keeps asking for correct Account ID, which cannot be entered since there is no option to enter Account id. Please look into this issue.
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.

data.text: GPay is my goto money transfer app, as it's UI and all the updates fulfill everything the users need. But, I've only 2 drawbacks regarding Gpay. 1. There's a lot of time the payment gets failed. But, it shows bank server issues. It would be better if this message can be shown before the transaction. 2. There should be tag available to the payment done (i.e. after the payment) Like Paytm. It only allow us to tag before the payment. If we forgot to mention the tag then it's over. Need solution.

My bank account is deleted from the app and now I am not able to add the account. Every time I try to add the account it states that your account is liked with many accounts but I only have 1 account in the bank. I also had a talk with the bank but they said it's the app's fault and error. It's been more then a month. Please let me know what can I do as I'm not able to uninstall the app.

Starting onwards smoothly working then when I update the app so much of error. From last one I could not showing my transactions list, I tried the uninstall and reinstalation but no use same error getting. Need to update the some features in your app.

WORST UPI APP. This app will not let you reset your UPI pin. Will keep showing you incorrect OTP even after you enter it correctly 10 times. It also doesn't process payments without issues. I finally had to use Phonepe to reset my UPI pin.
data.replyText: Regret the inconvenience, Rishabh. We suggest you contact our specialist team for assistance on this: https://goo.gle/2PQQFuc. Our team would be happy to help.

data.text: I can't receive money from people. It's saying I'm risky. It's so disappointing in many ways. First of all, people use this as an excuse to not send me money. I'm writing this review as i lost a payment of ₹1000. Secondly being called a risky contact is so embarrassing. People think that I'm into shady business. I tried raising this issue twice with the customer support. They declined it twice. Now I'm going to delete my account. I can't keep with this. So disappointing😕.

I've been using the Google Pay for a while now because I have a google pixel phone, which was good. So I download the app. However, my mom tried to send me $10 on the app so now I have money in the app that I can't even spend. I've tried to transfer it to a different card but I only have prepaid cards so it won't even transfer. And I tried looking it up and verifying my account but I don't even have a governmental ID or anything because I'm 17 so I can't finish the 1st step. Just stupid.
Scan and pay option is moved inside the settings tab. Initially it was available in the main screen. This feature is the one which we frequently use so it should be available in the main screen.

Another abandoned Google product that works great. Really making me lose faith in Google as a company, as it seems they always end up abandoning everything. As a pixel owner, I will be looking at other brands for my next phone, since who knows how long it will be supported.

Was a great app shame your getting rid of it. I guess that means no more youtube premium or google one subscription anymore for me once the app is gone... that's how I pay for it. Maybe you could add a function to the wallet so I can still pay that way. Just a thought.
All of a sudden, i can't use this app. I've checked my settings multiple times and still get the same message saying my settings don't allow nfc payments.

I like how easily the payments can be done in some cases. However most of the time when making bank payments, it shows trouble. Whenever you want to make a payment two in a row it stops. Also, the cashback and reward were good first but now they are not useful, relevant or good. The four offers you get after payment are all bad and not useful. Plus, they say to complete tasks for cashback and even if you do that, you won't get the offered cashback. So you can only use it for small payments.

Recently I got an issue like my transaction is failed , And the transaction history the status is failed. But my money got debited from the bank account and I didn't got any message like money got debited, but when I check my balance the money got debited. They said the money will be credited within 3days. still 3days completed but money was not credited Please fix this.

Probably worth more stars but, heard it's ending. I was going to start using this past app again yet, I just read an article that Google pay is no longer going to function in the US in the near future and did not want to put my private info out there when it will be no use to me. Let me know if I'm mistaken or this changes.
